login.tagline: Your personal AI companion for cycle & pregnancy tracking.
login.legal: By continuing, you agree to our

apiKey.title: Activate Your AI Features
apiKey.description: To enable personalized insights and AI-powered features, LunaCycle needs access to Google AI Studio.
apiKey.billingInfo: This may require a billing account to be set up.

profileSetup.title: Tell Us About Yourself
profileSetup.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields.
profileSetup.lastPeriodLabel: First day of your last period
profileSetup.optionalTitle: Add more history for better predictions (Optional)
profileSetup.optionalSubtitle: The more data you provide, the more accurate LunaCycle's predictions will be.

insights.title: Today's Insight
insights.ovulating: Peak fertility! Today is likely your ovulation day, the best time for conception.
insights.fertileWindow: You're in your fertile window. Conception is possible during this time.
insights.pms: Your period may be starting in the next few days. Be extra kind to yourself.
insights.periodSoon: Your period is likely to start in about {{count}} days.
insights.menstruation: You're on your period. Remember to rest and hydrate.
insights.general: Your body is in a regular phase. Keep up with your healthy habits!

noRecommendations: No personalized recommendations available at this time.
switchToPregnancyTracker: Switch to our pregnancy tracker for daily updates.
confirmSwitchDescription: This will pause cycle tracking and start your pregnancy journey. You can switch back at any time.
amazingJourneyBegins: An amazing new journey begins. We're here for you every step of the way.
babyIsSizeOf: Your baby is about the size of a {{size}}
whyExitPregnancyMode: Why are you exiting Pregnancy Mode?
nameJourneyDescription: Give this pregnancy journey a name to save it in your history (e.g., 'First Baby', 'Baby Smith').
noSavedJourneys: You have no saved pregnancy journeys.
noSymptomsLoggedJourney: No symptoms were logged during this journey.
setDueDateDescription: You can set your estimated due date or your pregnancy start date for more accurate tracking. The other date will be calculated automatically.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.noUserData: Could not find user data to generate analysis.
error.analysisFailed: Failed to generate analysis. Please try again later.
error.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
error.geolocationDenied: Location access was denied. We can't provide location-based suggestions without it.
error.occurred: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.
error.driveRestoreFailed: Could not restore from Google Drive.

settings.title: Settings
settings.driveDescription: Securely back up your encrypted data to your personal Google Drive. This allows you to restore your data on any device.
settings.driveNotConfigured: Google Drive backup is not available because the application is not configured correctly.
settings.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore? This will overwrite your current local data.

name: Name
remindersDescription: Enable reminders to stay on top of your health.

symptomTrends.title: Your Symptom Trends
symptomTrends.description: Here are your most frequently logged symptoms over the last {{count}} cycles.
symptomTrends.noData: Not enough data to show trends. Keep logging your symptoms daily!

noSavedTips: You have no saved tips yet.
logPeriodEndDescription: When was the last day of your period?
editCycleDescription: Update your past period dates for more accurate predictions. This will recalculate your cycle averages.
lunaWelcome: Hi {{name}}, I'm Luna! How can I help you today?

ad1.title: Prenatal Yoga Classes
ad1.description: Find peace and comfort during your pregnancy. Join our online classes.

ad2.title: Organic Maternity Wear
ad2.description: Comfortable, stylish, and sustainable clothing for your journey.

ad3.title: Healthy Meal Kits
ad3.description: Nutritious and delicious meals delivered to your door. Perfect for busy moms-to-be.

watchAdToUnlock: Watch a short ad to unlock {{featureName}} for today.
featureUnlocked: The feature has been unlocked for you.
